snippet: Riccardo Muti  has led to full houses, a much-improved orchestra and the first invitation for the Rome Opera to perform at the prestigious Salzburg Festival in Austria.
abstract: Presence of conductor Riccardo Muti at Teatro Dell'Opera di Roma in Rome has helped to resurrect once downtrodden theater and nudge it back to its former glory; Muti's prestige has brought full houses, improved orchestra and invitation for Rome Opera to perform at prestigious Salzburg Festival in Austria.
lead_paragraph: Riccardo Muti  has led to full houses, a much-improved orchestra and the first invitation for the Rome Opera to perform at the prestigious Salzburg Festival in Austria.

headline.seo: Riccardo Muti Helps the Rome Opera Restore Its Former Glory
headline.main: Maestro’s Steady Hand Helps Resurrect Rome Opera
headline.print_headline: Maestro’s Steady Hand Helps Resurrect Rome Opera
